reviews.review:
ooooyah. Play this game.

Has aged really well. Maybe not quite as strong as portal 2, but still certainly worth playing.

This was amazing, I completed the during quarantine! I loved solving the puzzles while a murderous AI insulted me in the background! Some of the puzzles had the best motivators, such as: being shot at, incineration, electrocution, and so much more!
Ending credit... was awesome. So meaningful stanzas.
Even though Portal 2 is better, this is still an amazing game and I'm GLaD that I finally beat it.
Really fun and challenging game. Using physics to solve puzzles. A must buy for sure.

its pretty good. its a little hard and im guilty of searching up portal walkthroughs on youtube just to get past some levels
If Portal isn't in your Steam library, there's something seriously wrong with you.

Fun game, affordable price tag - even more so if bought with Portal 2, runs well on high settings on many modern PCs, and it's a classic.
It's Portal, what did you expect me to type?
this game is cool portal is a good game and i beat it

by now we all know that the cake is a lie, but this game is an honest treat. it has aged more gracefully than a 1962 Ferrari 250 GTO with Gillian Anderson at the wheel, and GLaDOS is easily one of the most detestable yet lovable game villains ever written into existence. it's short, sweet, and an unforgettable experience... much like Gillian Anderson i imagine... anyway game good turret go halp 10/10.
Obviamente tenes que comprarlo, parece que tiene dificultad pero es f√°cil, pero esto no quita que sea mal juego. Lo recomiendo.

The bonus challenges is so frustrating, especially came to the minimum steps part because the steps counting system is broke as hell! You can get over 10+ steps by just jumping onto a box. Nevertheless, it was a great game, and I really love the portal mechanics and the interesting level design, especially when you can beat an entire level within 10 seconds if you placed your portal well. It also offered a different perspective to look into the half-life universe, which I really appreciate.
good game play, and i kinda have a bad computer, and it runs nicely
Wow amazing game. The girl's voice is very sexy.
Absolutely a fantastic game. Definitely worth the price. 10/10.
its super fun, and the puzzles are pretty easy
If you liked Portal 2, you'll enjoy this game.
stands up to this day as a very fun puzzle

Slk mlk jogasso tlgd. Recomendo muito namoral, joga o 2 tbm que pica demais. Jogabilidade foda, historia pica, dialogos bons e etc. The cake is a lie :D
i ordered cake after finishing this game. i dunno why... just remember feeling sad and betrayed
Its pretty short but makes up for it with some interesting puzzles. Not as great as its successor Portal 2 but is still great 14 years later
Amazing game, you even get some cake ;)

Incredible game with a really well constructed and tought-out story.
Amazing game considering its age, was worth it.
Great game, I play it about once a year.  Always fun.
A fun classic for any puzzle solving enthusiast with dynamic game play.

I love the puzzle solving aspect of this game, it's oddly relaxing. The promise of cake at the end is what keeps me going.
